rows.label: qst202320_msg007
rows.name:
To awaken Thanatobeast Andraz, you
must destroy the four sealstones.

rows.label: qst202320_msg001
rows.name: The song tells of their locations.

rows.label: qst202320_msg002
rows.name:
One, the stone of earth, is in a land of
verdant forest, another, the stone of
fire, in a sweltering waste.

rows.label: qst202320_msg003
rows.name:
The stone of water abides in the watery
land of eternal spring. The last, of wind,
in a tiny country blessed by sea breeze.

rows.label: qst202320_msg004
rows.name: That's what the song says, anyway!

rows.label: qst202320_msg005
rows.name:
I'll go and consult with my old teacher
about the location of the beast while
you're breaking the four seals.

rows.label: qst202320_msg101
rows.name:
You will find Thanatobeast Andraz in
a place called Xataris Spring in
Temperantia.

rows.label: qst202320_msg102
rows.name:
I hope you'll be back afterwards to
tell me the tale of your epic
beast-slaying!

rows.label: qst202320_msg103
rows.name:
Perhaps it'll be the inspiration for a
new song...
